title: Ocean Week Summoner Icon is here!

replies.body: Hey! I was wondering when will we receive our mystery champ?
As (patient) Sephyre has written a billion times the free champions are "given out in batches - so if you haven't received it yet don't worry. You should have it by the end of the week."
I got taric just then, the one champion I didn't want and rito gives me it, rito plz{{champion:44}}
Just play Taric jungle, so much fun
What You Will Miss said :) It's handed out in batches - if you earned at least 4 points then you should receive yours by the end of the week.
SHOUT OUT FROM SEPHYRE! WTFF :DDD
What if you already own every champion in league.
Then you get a Mystery Skin in place of the Mystery Champ.

haven't received the free champ for the community event, even no i contributed 72 point
over the week, Am i the only one or is this common
maybe ur last in the bunch. I got mordekaiser. I have no idea how to use him so this will be fun{{champion:82}}
go AP tank on him, he is rly fun
Just wanted you too know that some people are receiving mystery skins, even thou they still have sthey haven't collected yet.

This is nice however when will we receive the champion {{champion:432}} <-- like everyone wants {{champion:432}} so why not give everyone {{champion:432}}?

_EDIT: I can't count - changed to 4 :P_

Appreciate the feedback on {{champion:432}} ! 

As an update, we have started the process of handing out the mystery champion, but this one will take a few days. 

If you haven't received your mystery champion, and assuming you earned 4 points or more, don't worry it will be given out in batches and should be done by the end of week.
I thought you needed 4 points for Mystery Champion(/skin for those with less than 10 left)
Nice catch! Apparently I can't count :P Edited my post
Thank you Sephyre
So we can all have a new champion and a new icon, But {{champion:104}}  can't have his cigar?
Rito :< why u gave me this {{champion:6}} ? i swear i hate this champ most!!!

You got it ;) for each individual account riot went though all your messages to check what champion you hared the most and they gave it to you because they did not like you for blaming all random selections on them!

ever tried support urgot...
i have and it was amazing
My friends have received a mystery champ but why not me :(
It's given out in batches. It should complete by the end of the week. I haven't got mine yet either!
wheres that free champ tho?!?
It's given out in batches - so if you haven't received it yet don't worry. You should have it by the end of the week.

Thank you so much Riot for the skin and free champion. It's these sorts of events (especially Poro King) which keep the game from becoming stagnant and is an appreciated gesture :){{champion:201}} {{summoner:31}}
URF IS THE BEST!!!!
I joined Ocean week before the first battle but throughout the whole ocean week it wouldnt count any of of my wins towards it so I am not receiving any of the rewards

We don't have you down as enlisted at all, which would explain why the client wasn't tracking your contribution. As it is after the event, we can't make any exceptions for back tracking points and unfortunately that means we can't include you in the rewards.
As I have only four champions left to get, RIOT please.{{champion:202}}
you only get a champ if you have 10 or more champs left to get, otherwise you get a skin.
